game_description: 1.Song list: http://www.cqplanb.com/ccc/Danceworkout-songlist.html 2.We use microphone to react with rhythm, So If you refuse to open microphone permissions when first open app,there won't be reaction with rhythm. Never mind App still can work. 3.Make sure to review your surroundings and clear any obstacles in your play area before starting this game! 4.You 'd better have sweat proof sleeve on your Quest headset, you will sweat a lot happily when playing this. 5.Due to Copyright of music, we don't include music in this app. But we support custom import .mp3 into Quest and play. See how to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QfIdWHGalTY 6.If you can't keep up with the rhythm at first, please be patience to practice more times and also click 0.75X to slow down. 7.Will update new songs every month, If there are songs you wonder which are not in the list, Please don't hesitate to contact us immediately via E-Mail: 408077086@qq.com
review_1: When you play the game, the song doesn't work, and when you dance, it doesn't count as a point. Want my money back, please.
review_2: Waste of money. Want refund. Have to download music and it doesn't work.
review_4: You should not be charging for an app that doesnâ€™t even have the music added yet! I would like a refund immediately.
